author: yorickdowne
content: I've updated my testing summary above. I'm seeing failures on Sepolia with Geth v1.15.11; in testing so far, `master` resolves those

author: samcm
content:
https://ethpandaops.io/posts/eip7691-retrospective/

Follow up that looks at how 6/9 blobs performed to give us a little more confidence on a 60M gas limit.

tldr: Looks good for home users. If we make the same assumptions as we did last time then 9 blobs with a 60M gas limit also looks fine.
